Record.Description: Congenital disorders, usually autosomal recessive, characterized by severe generalized lack of ADIPOSE TISSUE, extreme INSULIN RESISTANCE, and HYPERTRIGLYCERIDEMIA.It is caused by mutation of gene encoding seipin (BSCL2).It is caused by mutations of gene encoding 1-acylglycerol-3-phosphate O-acyltransferase-2 (AGPAT2).
